text: Hagi maka kokankoka vahe'mo'zama Jerusalemi kumapi vahe'ma ha'ma eme huzmante'naza vahetega Ra Anumzamo'a kefo kri atresigeno eme zamazeri haviza hugahiankino, oti'za mani'nenageno zamavufagamo'a negasrinigeno, zamavu kerifina zamavurgamo'a negasrinigeno, zamagikampina zamagefunamo'a ana zanke huno kasrigahie.
